page.title: 09The Golf Club
page.content: The golf course was built in 1914.The club opens at 07.30 and closes at 20.00 in the Winter and 21.30 in the Summer.The course is 180 acres of trees,flags,putting holes and grass, excellent for playing on.The club has only a few professionals at present and a few famous members.The game is very popular.Now there are 832 members in all categories juniors,non-playing, social and over-seas players. Approximately there are 61 members ready to join and 41 employees.The members mostly come from Beaconsfield but some come from elsewhere.For members it costs 12 pounds for 1 round of golf.They cut the putting holes with a special tool like a cork screw.The manager has worked at the club for 5.5 years and thinks a lot could be inproved but they do very well.
